starMap.description: You've created a star chart as part of your heavenly studies. It is a Tiny object and can serve as a spellcasting focus for your druid spells.
benefits: You have the Guiding Bolt spell prepared (counts as druid spell, doesn't count against prepared spells)
Can cast Guiding Bolt without spell slot proficiency bonus times per long rest

forms.1: A scroll covered with depictions of constellations
forms.2: A stone tablet with fine holes drilled through it
forms.3: A speckled owlbear hide, tooled with raised marks
forms.4: A collection of maps bound in an ebony cover
forms.5: A crystal that projects starry patterns when placed before a light

starryForm.description: Harness constellations' power to alter your form

effects.appearance: Luminous body with glimmering joints connected by glowing lines
effects.light: Bright light 10 feet, dim light additional 10 feet

chalice.trigger: Cast healing spell with spell slot

dragon.effect: Treat 9 or lower as 10 on Intelligence/Wisdom checks and concentration saves

cosmicOmen.description: Divine will of cosmos using Star Map after long rest

weal.effect: Add d6 to attack roll, saving throw, or ability check

woe.effect: Subtract d6 from attack roll, saving throw, or ability check

twinklingConstellations.benefit: Can change constellation at start of turn

fullOfStars.description: Become partially incorporeal in Starry Form
